title:
Your
backup phrase
detail: Your secret backup phrase makes it easy to back up and restore your account.
warning: WARNING: Never disclose your backup phrase. Anyone with this phrase can take your Asset forever.
tip_detail: Store this phrase in a password manager like 1 Password. Write this phrase on a piece of paper and store in asecure location. If you want even more security, writeit down on multiple pieces of paper and store each in 2- 3 different locations.
